mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfAllAddrLnmInfo Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ROAD_NM_CD , UNDGRND_YN , BULD_MNNM , BULD_SLNO , LNM_SN , SUD_CD , SIDO_NM , SIGNGU_NM , LEGALEMDNM , LEGALRINM , MTN_YN , LNM_MNNM , LNM_SLNO , MVMT_RESN_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM INF_ALL_ADDR_LNM_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND ROAD_NM_CD = #{roadNmCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND UNDGRND_YN = #{undgrndYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND BULD_MNNM = #{buldMnnm,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND BULD_SLNO = #{buldSlno,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND LNM_SN = #{lnmSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
